Description.Name: Local Area Highlight 1
Description.Text: Phuket ranks among the top 10 scuba diving destinations in the world and is ideal for adventurers.

Description.Name: Local Area Highlight 2
Description.Text: Explore the Phuket jungle and keep an eye on wildlife while you are sitting atop an elephant.

Description.Name: Local Area Highlight 3
Description.Text: We are one of the friendliest Phuket, Thailand, family resorts with a location on Mai Khao Beach.

Description.Name: Local Area Highlight 4
Description.Text: Walk through Phuket Old Town and take some nice pictures of Shino-Portugese architecture

Description.Name: Local Area Highlight 5
Description.Text: Sea kayaking to discover the mysterious world of the "hongs" in Phang Nga Bay

Description.Name: Local Area Highlight 6
Description.Text: Snorkeling in Phi Phi island - an excellent snorkelling destination with shallow coral gardens

Description.Name: Guest Room Highlights 1
Description.Text: Our Phuket resort's stunning accommodations are conveniently located on the white-sand beach.

Description.Name: Guest Room Highlights 2
Description.Text: Our Phuket beachfront resort's rooms offer polished wood floors, rich silks and luxury bedding.

Description.Name: Guest Room Highlights 3
Description.Text: We are one of the most connected beach resorts Phuket has to offer with high-speed Internet.

Description.Name: Guest Room Highlights 4
Description.Text: Our elegant bathrooms have oversized tubs, separate showers, hair dryers, robes and slippers.

Description.Name: Guest Room Highlights 5
Description.Text: We boast eight luxury, one-bedroom, seaside suites at our striking Phuket beach resort's location.

Description.Name: Guest Room Highlights 6
Description.Text: Our Royal Villa features two-bedroom villas, a living/dining pavilion and a private poo

Description.Name: Guest Room Highlights
Description.ListItem: Our Phuket resort's stunning accommodations are conveniently located on the white-sand beach.
Our Phuket beachfront resort's rooms offer polished wood floors, rich silks and luxury bedding.
We are one of the most connected beach resorts Phuket has to offer with high-speed Internet.
Our elegant bathrooms have oversized tubs, separate showers, hair dryers, robes and slippers.
We boast eight luxury, one-bedroom, seaside suites at our striking Phuket beach resort's location.
Our Royal Villa features two-bedroom villas, a living/dining pavilion and a private poo

Description.Name: Description
Description.Text: The newly renovated JW Marriott Phuket Resort & Spa is set in a tropical paradise on Mai Khao Beach. 5-star resort; elegant accommodation with indoor Thai sala. 11 on-site restaurants & bars, cooking school. Mandara Spa, 3 magnificent pools, health club.

Description.Name: Property Description Long
Description.Text: Set 15 kilometers north of the Phuket airport in a tropical paradise, JW Marriott Phuket Resort & Spa introduces you to a realm of indescribable beauty, flawless service and thoughtful touches. Daydream by spectacular pools or venture beyond the doors of one of the finest Phuket, Thailand, resorts for an exhilarating day of elephant trekking, diving off the Similan Islands or exploring the wild on a safari. Our elegantly appointed guest rooms have wooden floor and Terracotta tiles, lustrous silks, and balconies with garden, pool or sea views to provide the ultimate indulgence that other resorts in Phuket, Thailand, cannot offer. For a culinary journey, we offer 11 restaurants and bars, in addition to Ginja Cook, our premier culinary school where you can learn the intricacies of fine Thai cooking. The award-winning Mandara Spa at our resort in Phuket will ease you into total relaxation with extraordinary Western and Asian treatments. Our resort's Phuket, Thailand, accommodations are a proud leader.

Description.Name: Sales Message
Description.Text: JW Marriott Phuket Resort and Spa is set in a tropical paradise, where the glistening sands of Mai Khao Beach meet blue sea. The resort is just 15 minutes drive from Phuket International Airport.

Description.Name: Top Selling Feature 1
Description.Text: No.1 ranking in the Travel + Leisure Worldâ€™s Best Awards 2014 in the category of Top Family Hotel in Asia.

Description.Name: Top Selling Feature 2
Description.Text: Our Phuket 5-star hotel is set on Mai Khao Beach with striking views of Andaman Sea and is 15 minutes from the airport.

Description.Name: Top Selling Feature 3
Description.Text: We serve international, Italian, Japanese, Thai, pastries, steak and seafood at our six restaurants and five bars.

Description.Name: Business/Group Highlight 1
Description.Text: Exceptional event menus at our Phuket convention center hotel that will inspire you!

Description.Name: Business/Group Highlight 2
Description.Text: 10 meeting rooms with a total of 850 sq m flexible space and a capacity for over 400 participants

Description.Name: Business/Group Highlight 3
Description.Text: Largest room is 600 sq m Mai Khao Ballroom, divisible into 5 smaller rooms, all with 4 m ceilings

Description.Name: Business/Group Highlight 4
Description.Text: Elegant covered poolside dining for 100, banquet seating for 400 and classroom-style for 352

Description.Name: Business/Group Highlight 5
Description.Text: The recreation team at our Phuket meeting facilities offers customized team-building exercises

Description.Name: Business/Group Highlight 6
Description.Text: Allow our expert planners at our convention center in Phuket to flawlessly coordinate your event

Description.Name: Property Social Event Meeting Highlight 1
Description.Text: Our beautiful, flexible Phuket wedding space includes 10 meeting rooms totaling 850 square meters.

Description.Name: Property Social Event Meeting Highlight 2
Description.Text: Accommodate up to 600 guests in our spacious Grand Ballroom for a large wedding in Phuket.

Description.Name: Property Social Event Meeting Highlight 3
Description.Text: Unparalleled personal service is the hallmark of all our social events and wedding preparations.

Description.Name: Property Social Event Meeting Highlight 4
Description.Text: Our professional event team can help you organize the best beach wedding Thailand has ever seen.

Description.Name: Property Social Event Meeting Highlight 5
Description.Text: We offer personalized packages for Phuket weddings to help make your special day memorable.

Description.Name: Property Social Event Meeting Highlight 6
Description.Text: Enjoy superb catering options from our award-winning restaurants to personalize your event.

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: Enjoy a creative blend of Eastern and Western flavours served in a casual setting, featuring an extensive breakfast buffet with Thai and Japanese specialties, fresh juice & more.

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: Come savor local Thai specialties and secret recipes at our Thai restaurant in Phuket.

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: Come experience our restaurant in Phuket, Thailand that has been rated the best Italian food in Asia by CondÃ© Nast Traveler, offered in an upbeat setting with authentic Italian fare. We offer pizza delivery during the day.

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: Join us for fine dining in Phuket at the Andaman Grill, and savour our succulent steaks and fresh seafood in a casual atmosphere served along with sweeping views of the Andaman Sea.

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: Our upscale, yet affordable, Phuket fine dining restaurant offers teppanyaki in a fun atmosphere.

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: Serving gourmet sandwiches, pastries, light snacks to eat in or to go. Picnic menus, a mat and a blanket are available for your private picnic dining.

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: Bring your vacation back to your kitchen as you learn the art of fine Thai cuisine at our premier Thai cooking school.

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: Creative Asian tapas are served with exotic drinks in this open-air lobby bar overlooking the reflection pool; an ideal spot for watching our Evening Sunset Ceremony.

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: We serve cocktails, fine wines & tapas while you enjoy musical entertainment in a soothing setting.

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: This delightful poolside bar offers a wide selection of cocktails & light snacks in a relaxed, tropical setting.

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: Crystal blue waters splash into the swimming pool surrounding our unique swim-up bar with sweeping views of the Andaman Sea.

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: Enjoy the casual setting at our restaurant in Phuket, Thailand which offers a sunny way to enjoy your juice at our newest pool bar, serving smoothies, fresh juices and great snacks.

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: The open-air pavilion features evening themed buffets

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: Casual all-day dining with food and flavors from East and West. The 7 themed nights are served a week long - Asian Street Food, Japanese Night, Fiesta Italiano, Simply Thai, Zurf&Turf Night, Seafood Buffet Night, and Cavery Night.

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: Located at Marriott's Mai Khao Beach. Offering the latest liquid trends from cool classics to modern day beverage innnovations. Snack menus are available.

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: A delicious rang of home-made delicacies. Fresh from the oven bakery, pastries, cakes and sandwiches. Beverages include coffee, teas, smoothies, boosters and ultimate shakes.

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: Silk Restaurant & Bar features discrete dÃ©cor, gourmet Thai cuisine and offers a destination dining experience in an elegant and comfortable setting.

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: Turtle Village Shops & Cuisine, a boutique shopping and dining village includes Bill Bentley, a traditional English pub, Turtle Mart offers a wide range of fresh vegetables and fruits, groceries, meat & daily products, pastries, snacks, drinks & magazines

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: The Royal Thai Restaurant in Phuket, features a piano bar showcasing live jazz, blues and Broadway standards nightly.

Address.AddressLine: Located adjacent to Joe's Downstairs and Da Maurizio Bar Ristorante,at 223 Prabaramee Road.

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: Lotus restaurant has been recognized as the best seafood restaurant on Bang Tao beach Phuket. The guests can select their own live seafood such as lobsters, sea bass, groupers, tiger prawns from the tanks, but guests can also enjoy the panoramic view.

Driving Instructions from Airport
Description.Text: Approximately 15 kilometers North of Phuket International airport, Hwy 402. From the airport turn right and follow the road to an intersection and turn left. Drive until next intersection and turn left onto the highway 402. Drive for approx. 8 km passing the Blue Canyon Golf Course. Turn left at the hotel sign. A resort limousine service is available for a fee, prior reservation required.

BarDescription.Name: Bar Short Description
BarDescription.Text: A quaint waterside bar and restaurant of the local expats on the south of the island

TPA_Ext_MessageType.Title: Stay Fit and Have Fun at JW Marriott Phuket

Description.Name: Message Text
Description.Text: An extensive selection of unforgettable guest experiences await. A carefully chosen balance of Sports & Fitness, Cultural Classes and Holistic Programming combine to offer you a complete set of activities. Family & kids will be entertained with loads of fun-filled activities outdoor & indoor.

TPA_Ext_MessageType.Title: Play golf at the championship course in Phuket

Description.Name: Message Text
Description.Text: Just 10 minutes from the resort, experience the legendary Blue Canyon Country Club, ranked by international media as one of the most prestigious golfing establishments in the region. Cradled in a 720-acre verdant valley, Blue Canyon offers award-winning championship golf courses to play like a pro.

TPA_Ext_MessageType.Title: Book Air + Hotel and Get up to 50% Savings

Description.Name: Message Text
Description.Text: When you book with Vacations by Marriott, your dreams of breathtaking beaches and unforgettable sunsets are just a click away. Enjoy fantastic savings of up to 50%! by booking air & hotel packages. Plus, Vacations by Marriott exclusively allows you to earn Marriott Rewards Points.Book now!

Description.Name: Message Text
Description.Text: Mandara Spa at JW Marriott Phuket Resort and Spa offers a heaven for guests to rest, relax and rejuvenate. A wide range of traditional and international health and beauty treatments are available, featuring high quality imported products as well as natural products grown in Thailand.

TPA_Ext_MessageType.Title: 2015 Turtle Release and the New Turtle Shelter

Description.Name: Message Text
Description.Text: Celebrating the Thai New Year by giving back to nature. Mark April 13 as an extra special day as we release rehabilitated sea turtles into the turquoise waters of Mai Khao Beach and welcome Tommy Turtle and his friends to the new Marine Turtle Shelter & Education Center.

TPA_Ext_MessageType.Title: 2015 Turtle Release and the New Turtle Shelter

Description.Name: Message Text
Description.Text: Celebrating the Thai New Year by giving back to nature. Mark April 13 as an extra special day as we release rehabilitated sea turtles into the turquoise waters of Mai Khao Beach and welcome Tommy Turtle and his friends to the new Marine Turtle Shelter & Education Center.

TPA_Ext_MessageType.Title: Match your trip with offer from JW Marriott Phuket

Description.Name: Message Text
Description.Text: No matter what kind of trip you preferred, romantic relaxing, having fun with family, spa indulging, golf playing, cooking experience or stay for dining, JW Mariott Phuket has created offers and promotions to suit you best on your valuable vacation to Phuket, Thailand.

Description.Name: Message Text
Description.Text: Celebrate the month of Love with your special someone. Indulge in magnifique moments of Valentine's at JW Marriott Phuket Resort & Spa with ultimate spa pampering, round-trip airport transfer and more. Book now and mention promotion code "LUV".

Description.Name: Message Text
Description.Text: The Saga Beef Promotion takes place at Kabuki Japanese Cuisine Theatre and is priced at THB 3,800++ per person with 6 premium courses including a glass of Ozeki Silver Sake. The Saga Beef Promotion Menu created especially for JW Marriott Phuket by renowned Chef Nakahara from Kira Restaurant in Ginza

Description.Name: Message Text
Description.Text: JW Marriott Phuket Resort & Spa is proud to announce the 10th Mai Khao Turtle Fun Run & Mini Marathon. Proceeds will be donated to the Injured Turtle Rehabilitation Program of the Phuket Marine Biological Centre, and the Marine Turtle Conservation Project by 3rd Naval Area Command.

TPA_Ext_MessageType.Title: Hot Deal! Save up to 50% off Stay for Breakfast

Description.Name: Message Text
Description.Text: Take advantage of our Hot Deal and enjoy up to 50% off Stay for Breakfast rates with complimentary in-room WiFi. Experience a realm of indescribable beauty, flawless service and thoughtful touches for an ultimate indulgence in Phuket. Book now for stays before 31 October 2015.

Description.Name: Message Text
Description.Text: JW Marriott Phuket Resort & Spa is recently awarded 2015 TripAdvisor Traveller's Choice as No.1 Best Family Hotel in Thailand and No. 5 Best Family Hotel in Asia. Book now to experience a wide range of resort activities for all ages, from tots to teens.

TPA_Ext_MessageType.Title: Enjoy Paradise at Half the Price

Description.Name: Message Text
Description.Text: Book now and enjoy 50% off your room rates plus Double Marriott RewardsÂ® Points at the JW Marriott Phuket Resort & Spa anytime between May 1 through June 30, 2015.

TPA_Ext_MessageType.Title: Enjoy Paradise at Half the Price

Description.Name: Message Text
Description.Text: Book now and enjoy 50% off your room rates plus Double Marriott RewardsÂ® Points at the JW Marriott Phuket Resort & Spa anytime between May 1 through June 30, 2015.

Description.Name: Message Text
Description.Text: We're offering the first Wellness Workshop program in a total of 3 days

Description.Name: Value proposition 1
Description.Text: The resort is located on exquisite tropical gardens with three swimming pools, freshwater ponds and natural preserved coastal wetlands overlooking the Andaman Sea on beautiful Mai Khao Beach. Just 15 minutes north of Phuket's International Airport.

Description.Name: Value proposition 2
Description.Text: The resort comprises 265 deluxe guest rooms of which 13 are suites. All Rooms are spacious and elegant with a minimum of 47 sq.m. Each room features a balcony, large working desk and indoor Thai Sala.

Description.Name: Value proposition 3
Description.Text: The resort offers 10 meeting rooms with a total of 770 square meters of flexible space and a capacity for 400+ participants. We also host elegant covered outdoor dining in a breathtaking tropical setting with superb catering options.

Description.Name: Value proposition 4
Description.Text: The Resort offers dedicated corporate teambuilding programs all of which can be tailor made to suit each clients individual requirements or even build their conference theme around the event. The team building programs have received numerous accolades fr

Description.Name: Value proposition 5
Description.Text: With six restaurants serving the finest international and Thai cuisine, guests will find a world of 5-star dining from Italian to Japanese, steaks and seafood to classic Thai at their fingertips.

Description.Name: Renovation description
Description.Text: Four Newly renovated One-Bedroom Oceanfront Pool Suites were designed for those seeking total privacy and the quintessential tropical resort experience with 18 sq.m. infinity private plunge pool facing the sea.

Description.Name: Renovation description
Description.Text: Deluxe Guest Rooms had been refurbished to enhance the guestrooms' ambience while staying with us with new fabric for in-room furnitures, headboards, curtains and new LCD 42 inch TV Screen.

Description.Name: Renovation description
Description.Text: Sala Sawasdee Lobby Bar was under construction to build up a new bar and expand the bar's capacity since the early of 2010. The extended area of Sala Sawasdee Lobby Bar will be capable up to 100 seats, including 25 seats at the bar.

Description.Name: Renovation description
Description.Text: The resort is going to renovate its Meeting Space with new high technology eqiupments for Visual and Audio systems, indluding new decoration, in order to ensure the great meeting experience for customers in Phuket, Thailand.

Description.Name: Renovation description
Description.Text: The resort has completed an extensive refurbishment of its meeting rooms and banquet facilities, which now boast a fresh and elegant new look.

Description.Name: Renovation description
Description.Text: JW Marriott Phuket Resort & Spaâ€™s award-winning Italian restaurant Cucina reopens now, following a two month refurbishment to broaden and further enhance the dining experience on offer.

Description.Name: Renovation description
Description.Text: JW Marriott Phuket reopened the doors of its Kidsâ€™ Pavilion, following an extensive upgrade. Better and more fun than ever, the new-look childrenâ€™s club is set to further strengthen the resortâ€™s reputation as one of Thailandâ€™s best family hotel

Description.Name: Group Description
Description.Text: The JW Marriott Phuket Resort & Spa has dedicated spacious conference and banqueting space. The conference area includes 10 meeting rooms with a total capacity for over 400 participants. The meeting rooms can be merged into a large Ballroom and two adjacent meeting rooms. The Kamala Boardroom with its own private terrace is an ideal venue for small executive meetings or can serve as a registration room for a large conference. The whole conference space is conveniently located near the resort's lobby and has a substantial pre-function area inside as well as an open air terrace. In addition the resort's Lotus Pavilion set next to the stunning Lotus Pond provides a great choice for banquets. Other inspiring venues include the resort's tropical gardens, one of the many restaurants or the pristine beachfront. Themed events, corporate teambuilding or even CSR programs can also be arranged to cater to each client's specific requirements. No matter the size of the meeting, the Resort's dedicated team works with organizers to ensure a seamless event experience.

Description.Name: Sales strategy
Description.Text: JW Marriott Phuket Resort & Spa is an ideal destination for both leisure and business. It's differentiated through its spacious guestrooms, authentic Thai design and popular three-large swimming pools. Located on 27 acres of tropical garden, the resort enjoys 10 miles of natural Mai Khao beach facing the Andaman Sea and take only 15 minutes to the Phuket Airport. The resort offers an action-packed weekly activities program for all ages with tailor-made teambuilding program and also exciting choice of 6 restaurants and 5 bars offers an extensive variety of cuisine for everyone's taste. The resort focus on increasing boutique wedding and corporate markets. Apart from Corporate groups, the resort is also the perfect destination for family escape and Honeymoon trips. The resort will continually feature the newly renovated One-Bedroom Oceanfront Pool Suites to the family and honeymooners for their tropical holidays and also will feature North Phuket as an exotic destination in Thailand.

Description.Name: Seasonality description
Description.Text: PEAK: 20Dec-10Jan ADR concerns. HIGH: 11Jan-31Mar enjoys higher-priced business from small groups.

Description.Name: Seasonality description
Description.Text: SHOULDER: More flexible with group rates.

Description.Text: LOW: Very flexible with group rates, consider volume business at up to 150 rooms.

Description.Text: PEAK: 20Dec-10Jan ADR concerns. HIGH: 11Jan-31Mar enjoys higher-priced business from small groups.

Description.Name: Is this golf club managed by Marriott Golf?
Golf Description
Description.Text: Two award-winning courses are available to choose each with 18 holes; the world campionship Canyon Course for a rigorous challenge or the stunning Lake Course for a relaxing round with magnificent veiws of lush green hills across the lakes

Description.Name: Fee Details
Description.Text: THB5600 for 18 holes, THB 2800 for 9 holes

Description.Name: Fee Details
Description.Text: THB4,400 for 18 holes, THB 2,200 for 9 holes

TPA_Ext_GolfClub.Name: Mission Hills Phuket Golf Resort & Spa

Description.Name: Is this golf club managed by Marriott Golf?
Golf Description
Description.Text: Sculpted among rubber plantations and mangrove forests, the 18 hole, par 72 course winds its way around a total of 6,806 yards. Water makes an appearance at 7 holes and the capricious sea breezes.

Description.Name: Fee Details
Description.Text: THB 3800 for 18 holes, THB 1900 for 9 holes

Description.Name: Is this golf club managed by Marriott Golf?
Golf Description
Description.Text: Twisting its way over the site of an old tin mine and through the lush hills of Kathu area, the Red Mountain course is a dramatic addition to Phuket's golf destinations

Description.Name: Fee Details
Description.Text: THB 5500 for 18 holes, THB 3,300 for 9 holes

Description.Name: Is this golf club managed by Marriott Golf?
Golf Description
Description.Text: Layout wind its way between refreshing lakes and rows of shady palm trees before taking you into the hills to traverse the slopes, requiring players to keep tight control of their shots, the Loch Palm is as invigorating to play as it is to gaze upon.

Description.Name: Fee Details
Description.Text: THB 3700 for 18 holes, THB 2,200 for 9 holes

Description.Name: Is this golf club managed by Marriott Golf?
Golf Description
Description.Text: The Longest established golf course in Phuket. Conveniently located between Phuket Town and patong beach, twisting through a valley of rolling hills and limestone cliffs.

Description.Name: Fee Details
Description.Text: THB 3500 for 18 holes, THB 1800 for 9 holes

Description.Name: Fee Details
Description.Text: THB 2100 for 18 holes, THB 1300 for 9 holes

Description.Name: Is this golf club managed by Marriott Golf?
Golf Description
Description.Text: Offer a satisfying and enjoyable game for practising and beginner golfers. This 9-hole, par 30 courses, set amidst the well-known tropical lushness which Phuket golf is so famed for. The course boasts a full range of facilities, including night-time golf.

Description.Name: Fee Details
Description.Text: THB 1600 for 18 holes, THB 950 for 9 holes

TPA_Ext_GolfClub.Name: Tublamu Royal Navy Golf Course, Khao Lak

Description.Name: Is this golf club managed by Marriott Golf?
Golf Description
Description.Text: This unique golf course is located and laid out at one of Khao Lak's most beautiful sandy bays, with a background of the tropical rainforest hills which provide a natural and relaxing experience.
